sub_title: Senior Software Testing Engineer|Lead Test Engineer |ISTQB - BCS Certified Tester|CSPO|Scrum Master
summary:
- Strategist and Innovative IT Expert with 13+ Years of Experience in Test Management, QA and Agile implementation aiming to help organizations to deliver high quality customer facing products in timely fashion as per company vision and strategy
- Sound work experience in Web Application Functional Testing including Web Services (Soap UI, Postman) and DB verification (Oracle SQL) and thorough understanding and hands-on experience in System Integration Testing, User Acceptance Testing, Regression Testing, Smoke Testing and Exploratory Testing.
- Excellent knowledge and working experience in Requirement Analysis, Test Plan Preparation, Test Scenarios and Test Cases Preparation, Test Execution, Test Results Reporting, Defect Reporting and Management, and Test Summary Report Preparation for delivering utmost Quality Product Using JIRA / Test Director / HP Quality Center. 
- Design and develop test automation framework for both front end (web-based UI) and back end (RESTful API) application by using JAVA, Selenium WebDriver, Cucumber, Rest Assured.
- Experienced in implementation/testing & certifications in the areas of Cards Management, Issuer Processing, Switch Implementation, Acquirer Processing (ATM, POS), Networks (MasterCard, Visa & Discover) & Fraud Detection/Management Systems implementation of Web Services and Socket Services and Card Generation processes. i was focused on Business and Financial analysis. 
- Experience of Loyalty Platform. It is an intelligent decisions engine designed to deliver a suite of Loyalty Solutions to the consumers
- Performed database integrity testing, write SQL and PL/SQL statements and procedures to analyze data
- Performed cross platform testing on various browsers like IE, FF and windows series
- Worked closely with developers, support group to ensure test environment, application and data readiness.

Specialties
Quick learner and Team player, Ability to perform well in high work loads.
Testing Tools :HP Quality Center , HP UFT,  Selenium Web Driver, Cucumber, Rest Assured, LeanFT, Apache Jmeter, Jenkins, JIRA, Azure ALM, Postman, Swagger, SOAP UI
Databases: My SQL, Informix, Oracle

treasury_media.title: ISTQB - BCS Certified Tester Foundation level
SAFe 4.0 Agilist.pdf
treasury_media.description: The SAFe Agilist certification program is for executives, managers and Agile change agents responsible for leading a Lean-Agile change initiative in a large software enterprise. It validates their knowledge in applying the Scaled Agile Framework, lean thinking, and product development flow principles in an enterprise context so they can lead the adoption of the Scaled Agile Framework.

projects.title: MCP Web Services Suite
projects.description: i2c’s MCP Web Services Suite is set of core & business critical Payment Industry Web Services like Funds Transfer (Credit/Debit), Reversal, Balance Inquiry, Mini Statement, Transaction History, Single Sign On, Coupon Generation, Card Activation, Card Upgradation, Product & Card Purchases. The MCP Web Services are developed using core & enterprise Java Technologies as well as SOAP based Web Services.

projects.title: i2c Engage (Loyalty Platform)
projects.description:
i2c Engage is a loyalty and marketing platform that allows you to create dynamic campaigns for each stage of the customer life-cycle. By processing real-time data on your customers’ transactions, behaviors and locations, it provides you with the essential contextual information needed to get the right communication to the right person at the right time via the right channel.


Components:
+ Admin Portal: Promotions, Campaigns, Registration, Targeting, Triggering Definition
+ Consumer Portal: Consumer to manage their preferences, choosing, saving offers etc
+ Back-end Engines: Offer Processing Engine, Offer Delivery Engine, Offer Triggering Event Handler, Data Manager, Alert Engine, Web Service Interface.

Worked on:
+ Web Service Interface, Offer Processing Engine, Offer Delivery Engine, Offer Triggering Event Handler, Data Manager.

profile_positions.title: Senior Software Testing Engineer | Lead Test Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for ensuring stability, availability and reliability of production platforms and applications through the planning and execution of functional and non-functional testing. Moreover also be responsible for ensuring high quality systems development by developing, implementing and executing Quality Assurance processes and procedures.
- Established QA test team, developed automated testing framework for automating Web and back-end (REST) applications
- Trained QA team for automation and functional testing
- Reduce 20% manual QA effort by automating regression level test cases
- Managed & trained offshore Teams, defined test plan, test strategy document, and performed defect management & reporting. 
- Participated in project related status meetings with business and key management stakeholders. Moreover holding daily stand up meetings, grooming sessions, and sprint planning and retrospective meetings.
- Conducted Smoke testing, System Integration testing (SIT), User Acceptance testing (UAT), Interface testing, Regression testing, functional testing and grey box testing
- Delivered thorough QA testing reports to all stakeholders that determined product quality and release readiness.
profile_positions.title: Software Quality / Test Lead | Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
- Initiated Test Automation using selenium, java and Cucumber which saves a lot of efforts in manual verification.
- Increase code test coverage for Rest API using Rest Assured framework for Regression testing and it is integrated with git and Jenkins, so it will fail fast in case of error.
- Tested different application like Java based, .net (desktop application), and Mobile Application on different platforms like Windows server / Linux and Mobile Devices.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Quality Assurance Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Involved in the Development, Testing and Implementation of Products / Projects:
C-Trust: Fraud Prevention and Detection System based on intelligence, self learning algorithms and Neural Networks for financial industry.
eFund(FIS): Core business implementation based on ISO 8583 protocol which is used for Transaction Processing in financial industry.
MasterCard: Core business implementation based on ISO 8583 protocol using direct connection with MasterCard network which is used for Transaction Processing in financial industry.
Visa: Core business implementation based on ISO 8583 protocol using direct connection with Visa network which is used for Transaction Processing in financial industry.
Discover: Core business implementation based on ISO 8583 protocol using direct connection with Discover network which is used for Transaction Processing in financial industry.
My Card Place (www.mycardplace.com): Stored value card management system with Cardholder website, Customer Server Center, IVR, Web POS, Card Program Manager, Card Production, Switch Networks, OLTP, IntelloAgent and lot of other modules.
Also Extracting the Business requirements of repaid by reading the ISO8583 manuals of payment networks e.g Discover, VISA, MasterCard ,eFunds from issuer prospective.
Communicating with Payment Networks e.g Discover, VISA, MasterCard and eFunds for the certification /Production implementations and for production issues.

•	Review of Functional Specification, test plan preparation, and test scenarios writing.
•	Designing test cases for automation testing
•	Participate in designing and execution of test cases. Creating Defect Report for management reporting
•	Record discrepancies between functionality and specification.
•	Effective defect tracking and reporting using Test Director / Quality Center.
•	Production Support regarding queries/questions and issues faced by the clients.
•	Bug fixing and work on basic level development.
profile_positions.title: Principal Software Quality Assurance Engineer

profile_positions.description:
MCP Backend Services
It is Business layer of MCP and is a set of services those are used by clients (of i2c) internal and external; these services can be used to perform all the functions related to card processing system.

I2C INC. ENGAGE (LOYALTY PLATFORM)
I2c Engage is a loyalty and marketing platform that allows you to create dynamic campaigns for each stage of the customer life-cycle. By processing real-time data on your customers’ transactions, behaviors and locations, it provides you with the essential contextual information needed to get the right communication to the right person at the right time via the right channel.

Responsibilities:
• Analysis of requirements and Design review
• To ensure Software and Application is built according to the specification
• To identify, write scenarios.
• To write and execute test cases
• Designing test cases for data driven automation testing framework
• Executing the automated test cases
• Test Functional requirements
• Test product according to the acceptance test criteria
• Test shipment package according to the instruction
• Training of support team.
• Verification of product at production servers
